metadata.description: A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins for agentic development workflows, featuring tools for architecture, knowledge management, and development automation

plugins.name: consultant
plugins.description: Flexible multi-provider LLM consultations using Python/LiteLLM - includes consultant agent, review/bug-investigation commands, and consultant skill for deep AI-powered code analysis across 100+ models

plugins.name: prompt-engineering
plugins.description: Tools for reviewing, analyzing, refining, and optimizing LLM prompts for clarity, precision, goal effectiveness, and token efficiency

plugins.name: vibe-workflow
plugins.description: Ship high-quality code faster with less back-and-forth

plugins.name: solo-dev
plugins.description: Toolkit for solo developers to build, manage, and grow their business - customer profiling, brand guidelines, design system, SEO strategy, content creation, and more

plugins.name: vibe-extras
plugins.description: Standalone utilities that complement the core development workflow

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Frontend design patterns and implementation skills for distinctive, non-generic UI experiences

plugins.name: life-ops
plugins.description: Personal decision-making and life workflow support

plugins.name: vibe-experimental
plugins.description: Experimental verification-first workflows. Every criterion has explicit verification; execution can't stop without verification passing or proper escalation.
